graph_textual_report: The undirected graph DrugBankDDI has 2192 nodes, of which 1 are singletons, and 242027 unweighted edges, of which none are self-loops. The graph is quite dense as it has a density of 0.10079 and has 3 connected components, where the component with most nodes has 2189 nodes and the component with the least nodes has a single node. The graph median node degree is 155, the mean node degree is 220.83, and the node degree mode is 11. The top 5 most central nodes are DB09228 (degree 1034), DB05540 (degree 1028), DB01257 (degree 992), DB06652 (degree 963) and DB03819 (degree 952).
